Summary: Black circular like object, fast moving, made somewhat high pitched static noise, arrived quickly, hovered for a few seconds, then left.
trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Pensacola
There were no other sightings in Pensacola on or around June 17th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was outside on the side deck of my home stargazing, it was a partly cloudly night, so a fair amount of the light from the city was blocked, and more stars were visible than normal. i quickly caught the object in my peripheral vision and turned my head automatically, thinking it may have been a bat or bird, until it suddenly stopped in midair, i could hear a faint static noise being emitted from it, it floated in place for several seconds, i could not see any motion from the object, a strange feeling fell over me, most likely a mix of excitement and nervousness\fear that i was actually seeing it. i stood there motionless and silent as i stared. after a few seconds of staying motionless, the object made a semicircular motion, and left the area at an extreme rate of speed, disappearing from the horizon within about a second, maybe a second and a half. though this may be unrelated, the nearby military base is currently closed down to all but the personnel they deem necessary on it over the weekend.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
